data.enText: to think that sb/sth is good, acceptable or suitable

data.chText: 我告诉母亲我不想继续上学，但是母亲不同意。
data.enText: I told my mother I wanted to leave school but she didn't approve.
Do you approve of my idea?
She doesn't approve of me leaving school this year.
She doesn't approve of my leaving school this year.
to officially agree to a plan, request, etc.

data.chText: 委员会一致通过了计划。
data.enText: The committee unanimously approved the plan.
to say that sth is good enough to be used, or is correct
The course is approved by the Department for Education.

data.chText: 以上各词均含答应、同意之义。
data.enText: These words all mean to say that you will do what sb wants or that you will allow sth to happen.
agree
to say that you will do what sb wants or that you will allow sth to happen
He agreed to let me go early.
approve

data.chText: 指批准、正式通过（计划、建议或要求）：
data.enText: to officially agree to a plan, suggestion or request

data.chText: 委员会一致通过了计划。
data.enText: The committee unanimously approved the plan.
consent
( rather formal ) to agree to sth or give your permission for sth

data.chText: 她最终同意回答我们的问题。
data.enText: She finally consented to answer our questions.
acquiesce

data.chText: 指默然接受、默认、默许、顺从：
data.enText: ( formal ) to accept sth without arguing, even if you do not really agree with it

data.chText: 政府高级官员必然已经默许掩盖真相。
data.enText: Senior government figures must have acquiesced in the cover-up.
to agree/consent to sth
to agree/consent to do sth
to be prepared/willing/unwilling/forced to agree/approve/consent/acquiesce
to refuse to agree/approve/consent/acquiesce
to agree to/approve/consent to a request
to agree to a demand
to readily agree to/approve/consent to/acquiesce in sth
to reluctantly agree to/approve/consent to/acquiesce in sth

simple_means.memory_skill: ap 加强 + prov 证明 + e → 证明可行 → 赞成

ex.enText: The firm agreed to the terms.

ex.chText: 那名导演同意拍那部电影。
ex.enText: That director agreed to do the film.

ex.chText: 如今大多数人这么认为，能力比学历更重要。
ex.enText: Most people nowadays would agree that ability is more important than a diploma.

synonyms.bx: 最普通用词，指就某一计划、安排、建议等与他人持相同看法，常后接介词 to/with、动词不定式或 that 从句。

ex.enText: He didn't accede to my request.

ex.chText: 我们大家都同意要他辞职的请求。
ex.enText: We all acceded to the demands for his resignation.

synonyms.bx: 尤指最初不同意后又应允要求、请求、计划等，常后接介词 to。

ex.enText: I strongly approve of your proposal.

ex.chText: 玛丽想当然地认为他们一定会同意这个想法。
ex.enText: Mary took it for granted that they would approve of the idea.

synonyms.bx: 指认为某人或某事是好的、对的、合适的，常后接介词 of。

ex.enText: He assented to the committee's proposal.

ex.chText: 他们同意合同的条款了吗？
ex.enText: Have they assented to the terms of the contract?

synonyms.bx: 指审慎考虑后同意某项建议、要求、意见、计划等，常后接介词 to。

ex.chText: 我确信你的老师不会同意的。
ex.enText: I'm sure your teacher won't consent.

ex.chText: 经过几个小时的劝说，他们同意放弃罢工。
ex.enText: After hours of persuasion they consented to abandon the strike.

ex.chText: 她父亲勉强答应了这桩婚姻。
ex.enText: Her father reluctantly consented to the marriage.

synonyms.bx: 较正式用词，指同意别人的请求、建议或满足他人的愿望，常后接介词 to 或带 to 的动词不定式。

tr: judge to be right or commendable

example: I approve of his educational policies

value.def: If you approve of an action, event, or suggestion, you like it or are pleased about it.

example.ex: Not everyone approves of the festival...
example.tran: 不是所有人都赞成庆祝该节日。

value.def: If you approve of someone or something, you like and admire them.

example.ex: You've never approved of Henry, have you?...
example.tran: 你从来没有喜欢过亨利，对吗？

example.ex: I didn't approve of his manner.

value.def: If someone in a position of authority approves a plan or idea, they formally agree to it and say that it can happen.

example.ex: The Russian Parliament has approved a program of radical economic reforms...
example.tran: 俄罗斯议会已经通过一项重大经济改革方案。

example.ex: MPs approved the Bill by a majority of 97.
example.tran: 议员们以97票的多数票通过了该议案。

value.def: If a product or person is approved by an official organization, they are declared to be of a good enough standard to be used or employed.

example.ex: We have three suppliers in all who are approved by the Organic Farm Food Association.
example.tran: 我们总共有3家获有机农产品协会认可的供货商。

rootsaffixes.indicate: = honesty, integrity, to prove 诚实, 正直；证明
rootsaffixes.title: prob, prov

partsOfSpeech.dec: ap 加强 + prob 诚实，正直；证明 + ate 做，造成，使… → 一再证明〔可行〕→ 批准
ap 表加强 + prob 诚实，正直；证明 + ation，approbate 的名词 → 认可；称赞
ap 加强 + prov 诚实，正直；证明 + e → 证明可行 → 赞成
ap 表加强 + prov 诚实，正直；证明 + al 表行为 → 赞成
dis 不 + approbation 认可；称赞 → 不称赞
dis 不 + approve 赞成；承认 → 不赞成
dis 不 + prov 诚实，正直；证明 + e → 证明不可行 → 证明为假
prob 诚实，正直；证明 + ability 可…性 → 可能性
prob 诚实，正直；证明 + able 可…的 → 能证明的 → 可能的
prob 诚实，正直；证明 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 查验，鉴定
prob 诚实，正直；证明 + ative 有…倾向（性质）的，属于…的 → 为了证明 → 试验的
prob 诚实，正直；证明 + e → 为了证明 → 查明
prob 诚实，正直；证明 + ity 具备某种性质，状况 → 正直
re 相反 + prob 诚实，正直；证明 + ate 表名词 → 不诚实，不正直 → 恶棍
re 相反 + prob 诚实，正直；证明 + ation，reprobate 的名词 → 谴责
re 反对 + prov 诚实，正直；证明 + e → 反对别人的证明 → 责备，训诫
